coreAttributes.name: demonstone necklace
coreAttributes.description: A necklace consisting of a thin chain with a shard of mostly-inert demonstone threaded onto it as a decorative pendant. As an alternative to being worn around the neck, it would be possible to wrap the chain around your wrist.
